amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part D of House Report 117-366 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 2 and 8.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised of amendments numbered 2 and 8, printed in Part D of House Report 117-366.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendments (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 412 - 8 (Roll no. 263).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mrs. Dingell.
